name: MindThrow
tag_list: wikipedia, web-2-0, social-networking, mashup, facebook, interests, events, hobbies, activities, favorites
overview:
MindThrow helps users discover new interests and new things to do based on what they already like. Built on a revolutionary intelligent tagging system, MindThrow learns associations between users and their favorite interests and then uses these associations to make recommendations that the users may not have thought of on their own.

MindThrow also enables users to create and categorize Events based on their favorite interests and then invite their friends. Public events can be searched through using the tagging system, enabling Event hosts to easily publicize their events to a wide audience of interested searchers.

Even more, MindThrow is integrated with Facebook, which means you can compare your favorite interests with your friends and find out how alike you really are.

So go check out MindThrow today: you’re certain to find something new to do!
